name: ItemFrameEntityHelper
description: The ItemFrameEntityHelper class provides specialized access to Minecraft item frame entities, including both regular item frames and glow item frames.
overview: The ItemFrameEntityHelper class provides specialized access to Minecraft item frame entities, including both regular item frames and glow item frames. This helper extends the base EntityHelper class and adds specific functionality for interacting with the item displayed in the frame, its rotation, and whether it's a glowing variant. Item frames are decorative entities that can display items on their faces, commonly used for storage, decoration, or redstone contraptions.

methods.name: isGlowingFrame
methods.description: Checks if the entity is a glow item frame (minecraft:glow_item_frame) that emits light.

methods.name: getRotation
methods.description: Returns the rotation of the item displayed in the frame. Items can be rotated in 45-degree increments, with 8 possible orientations (0-7).
examples:
const currentRotation = itemFrame.getRotation();
const degrees = currentRotation * 45;

methods.name: getItem
methods.description: Retrieves the item currently displayed in the item frame. Returns an empty ItemStackHelper if the frame is empty.
